name: Stack'Em Toys
description:
In Stack'em Toys you will play as a toy factory worker. Yo will have to put 100 toys over the table without making them fall!

Team members:

  • Miguel Muñoz Molina - Programmer and VFX Artist
  • Laura Marzo Román - 3D Artist
  • Elise Grey Ashre - Musician

This game was made for Indie Spain Jam 2022.

All resources are our own unless SFX and Victory music, that are from FreeSound

You can follow me and my partners in twitter clicking in our names!
